description.text: Helps patients find suitable doctors through intelligent recommendations powered by custom AI logic.
Implements secure access for patients, doctors, and admins with distinct privileges and dashboards.
Patients can book, modify, and cancel appointments while doctors manage their schedules efficiently.

description.text: Designed for collaborative project management with task assignment, file submissions, and audit tracking.
